user_question: How can I secure my home network against cyber threats, and can you generate an image of a secure home network setup?
final_answer: To secure your home network: 1) Change default router passwords. 2) Enable WPA3 encryption. 3) Use a strong, unique Wi-Fi password. 4) Keep firmware updated. 5) Disable WPS. 6) Use a guest network for visitors. Image of a secure home network setup generated. To monitor your network: 1) Use network monitoring software. 2) Check router logs regularly. 3) Set up alerts for unusual activity. 4) Use a firewall to block suspicious traffic.
